alert.note: Alert for Iredell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Iredell County through 530 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Statesville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Statesville, Troutman and Scotts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
